title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (http://contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/

title: Authors and Citation

code: @Manual{,   title = {rtiddlywiki: R Interface for TiddlyWiki},   author = {Bangyou Zheng},   year = {2022},   note = {https://rtiddlywiki.bangyou.me/, https://github.com/byzheng/rtiddlywiki}, }

title: R Interface for TiddlyWiki
text: R interface tiddlywiki unique non-linear notebook capturing, organising sharing complex information.

what: Communicate with WebServer API for node.js only
title: R Interface for TiddlyWiki
text: WebServer APIs tiddlywiki implemented R interface including GET list tiddlers filters, tiddler, file; PUT new tiddler.
code: tw_options(host = "http://127.0.0.1:8080/") # Get all tiddlers get_tiddlers() # Get a tiddler by title  get_tiddler(title = "GettingStarted")  # Put a new tiddler  title <- "New tiddler" text <- c("!! Section",           "This is a new tiddler") type <- "text/vnd.tiddlywiki" tags <- c("Tag1", "Tag 2") put_tiddler(title = title,              text = text,             type = type,              tags = tags)

what: Generate markdown tiddler from Rmarkdown file
title: R Interface for TiddlyWiki
text: new output format tiddler_document exported generate markdown tiddler Rmarkdown file PUT tiddlywiki WebServer. image files generated knitr copied local folder tiddlywiki PUT file API tiddlywiki 5.2.2. temporary solution. Two parameter used specify host tiddlywiki server path local file system. new tiddler json format generated Rmd folder can used import tiddlywiki server single file. tiddler PUT server host specified. images copy local file system tiddlywiki path specified. yaml header can specified export tiddler_document. title Rmarkdown file used tiddler name.
code: title: "R Markdown file" output:    rtiddlywiki::tiddler_document:     path: "C:/Users/zhe00a/OneDriveCSIRO/Working/09-Blog/tiddlytest"     host: "http://127.0.0.1:8080/"     tags: ["tag 1", "tag 2"]

title: Generate tiddler in json format — .tiddler_json
code: .tiddler_json(   title,   text,   type = c("text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text/x-tiddlywiki", "text/x-markdown", "text/html",     "text/plain"),   tags = NULL )

title: Generate tiddler in json format — .tiddler_json
text: title tiddler title text tiddler text type tiddler type tags tiddler tags

title: Get all tiddlers — get_tiddlers
text: filter filter identifying tiddlers returned (optional, defaults "[[tiddlers]![system]sort[title]]") exclude comma delimited list fields excluded returned tiddlers (optional, defaults "text")

title: Put a tiddler — put_tiddler
code: put_tiddler(   title,   text,   type = c("text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text/x-tiddlywiki", "text/x-markdown", "text/html",     "text/plain"),   tags = NULL )

title: Put a tiddler — put_tiddler
text: title tiddler title text tiddler text type tiddler type tags tiddler tags

title: Put a tiddler — put_tiddler
code: if (FALSE) { title <- "New tiddler" text <- c("!! Section",           "This is a new tiddler") type <- "text/vnd.tiddlywiki" tags <- c("Tag1", "Tag 2") put_tiddler(title = title, text = text, type = type, tags = tags) }
